reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress elegant, perfect for both dress-up and dress-down occasions, and well-made. They appreciate its stretchiness, comfort, and color, with one customer noting the lightweight stretchy material. The fit and size receive mixed feedback - while some say it fits all curves perfectly and is true to size, others find it runs large. The material quality is also mixed, with some loving it while others find it extremely thin without lining or stitch support. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!
items.body: The first dress I received, the zipper was not correctly sewn in. I requested a replacement and the second dress was sent. Ladies, this is a stunning dress! I received so many compliments on it! The fabric is thin but it washes well. It does get wrinkly so you may have to steam it. Since the fabric is thin, it does show lines like in the top of pantyhose. But, thatâ€™s easily fixable with a shaper. You may need some double sided tape to keep the top of the dress where you want it. Also, the dress is plain so accessorize!! With heels, the length was perfect. Thereâ€™s give to the fabric and itâ€™s comfortable to move and sit in. Itâ€™s pretty true to size. My only complaint was that my bracelets caught on the fabric constantly. It pulled out little strands of the fabric and made the dress look cheap. Iâ€™d buy this dress a 100x over. I canâ€™t say enough good things about this dress! Read more
items.author: Quikufem

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable
items.body: Got this for my little sister to wear for a wedding and it was amazing! Fabric was comfortable and stretchy and the color is beautiful. It is form fitting and clingy so definitely need to wear seamless panties or you will be able to see them Read more
items.author: Michelle Piette

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to Size
items.body: the material is so stretchy and comfortable. IT is not as long as the photo. wish it could have been longer but it still fits amazing. the colour is just as seen in the photo and the material is not very thick but not too thin either. Read more
items.author: Renice Sealy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars The material was thin
items.body: I really wanted to love this dress, but the material is much thinner than I expected. It looks cute in the pictures, but in person the fabric feels cheap and you definitely need to wear something underneath because itâ€™s almost see-through. The fit was okay, but the quality of the material makes it hard to wear comfortably. If youâ€™re looking for something with thicker, better quality fabric, this might not be the best choice. Iâ€™m a little disappointed overall. Read more
items.author: Osheen Maye

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress especially for the price!
items.body: I needed a last minute bridesmaid dress for a wedding because at 7 months pregnant the original dress was too tight and had no give. This dress was perfect! It had the perfect amount of stretch and the dress was thick enough. It was very comfortable and was not see through at all! Overall, very satisfied and the style fit the other bridesmaids perfectly. I did get a small and it was perfect. I saw another review who was 7 months pregnant and she said the small was perfect. Read more
items.author: Deja Agee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Color
items.body: This is gorgeous!! The color was beautiful and the material was very satin. Great material. Was not too tight and not loose. This dress had good weight without being heavy. It was like a smooth hug on my figure. I am 3 months post partum but it was true to size and hid most of my tummy. The dress is a must buy! Read more
items.author: Christy R.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hit or Miss
items.body: The dress was cute in the picture but nothing like that in person. It did not look much like what was ordered when I put it on. While I am not as small as the model, I am shaped that way, and it wasn't very flattering. Read more
items.author: Tiffany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it !
items.body: Love love love !! I could have gone on a smaller size but with my sizes itâ€™s hard (5â€6, 175-200 , b size chest 40ish back ) But this dress was amazing The material was so stretchy, I honesty didnâ€™t have to get the size I did . I should have one at least a size down min. But it was still beautiful and flawless!! And I can still get it taken in because of the fabric !! Love it so much ! Read more
items.author: Amy Gonzalz

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Off Shoulder Formal High Split V Neck Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Off Shoulder Formal High Split V Neck Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Off Shoulder Formal High Split V Neck Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mulberry Purple, 645-rose Red, Black, Champagne, Coffee, 645-mulberry Purple, 645-royal Blue, Red, Rose Red, 645-black, 645-purple, Navy, Wine Red, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
